languages.text: "Говори, или я вырву воспоминания вместе со Священным железом, встроенным в твой мозг". {n}Чеканя каждое слово, Паскаль активирует буровой мехадендрит.{/n} "Что тебе известно об Амарнате?"

"Speak or I will rip your memories out along with the Ferrum Sanctum implanted in your brain." {n}Pasqal enunciates each word as he activates his drilling mechadendrite.{/n} "What do you know of Amarnat?"
languages.original_text: "Говори, или я вырву воспоминания вместе со Священным железом, встроенным в твой мозг". {n}Чеканя каждое слово, Паскаль активирует буровой мехадендрит.{/n} "Что тебе известно об Амарнате?"

traits.locale_text: "Speak or I will rip your memories out along with the Ferrum Sanctum implanted in your brain." {n}Pasqal enunciates each word as he activates his drilling mechadendrite.{/n} "What do you know about Amarnat?"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Speak or I will rip your memories out along with the Ferrum Sanctum implanted in your brain." {n}Pasqal enunciates each word as he activates his drilling mechadendrite.{/n} "What do you know of Amarnat?"

traits.locale_text: "Speak or I will rip your memories out along with the Ferrum Sanctum implanted in your brain." {n}Pasqal enunciates each word as he activates his drilling mechadendrite.{/n} "What do you know of Amarnat?"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「話せ、さもなくばその脳に埋められたフェルム・サンクトゥムごとその記憶を引き裂いてやろう」{n}パスカルは一言ずつはっきりと述べつつ、ドリルがついた機械触手を起動する。{/n}「アマルナトの情報を話せ」
languages.original_text: "Speak or I will rip your memories out along with the Ferrum Sanctum implanted in your brain." {n}Pasqal enunciates each word as he activates his drilling mechadendrite.{/n} "What do you know of Amarnat?"

traits.locale_text: 「話せ、さもなくばその脳に埋められたフェルム・サンクトゥムごとその記憶を引き裂いてやろう」{n}パスカルは一言ずつはっきりと述べつつ、ドリルがついた機械触手を起動する。{/n}「アマルナトの情報を話せ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “快说，否则我就把你的记忆，连同植入你大脑的钢铁圣所一起挖出来。”{n}帕斯卡一边激活他的钻孔机械触须，一边一字一顿地说道。{/n}“你对阿玛纳特了解多少？”
languages.original_text: "Speak or I will rip your memories out along with the Ferrum Sanctum implanted in your brain." {n}Pasqal enunciates each word as he activates his drilling mechadendrite.{/n} "What do you know of Amarnat?"

traits.locale_text: “快说，否则我就把你的记忆，连同植入你大脑的钢铁圣所一起挖出来。”{n}帕斯卡一边激活他的钻孔机械触须，一边一字一顿地说道。{/n}“你对阿玛纳特了解多少？”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Parlez, ou je ferais extraire vos souvenirs en même temps que le Ferrum Sanctum implanté dans votre cerveau, » {n}menace Pasqal en activant sa mécadendrite foreuse.{/n} « Que savez-vous d'Amarnat ? »
languages.original_text: "Speak or I will rip your memories out along with the Ferrum Sanctum implanted in your brain." {n}Pasqal enunciates each word as he activates his drilling mechadendrite.{/n} "What do you know of Amarnat?"

traits.locale_text: « Parlez, ou je ferais extraire vos souvenirs en même temps que le Ferrum Sanctum implanté dans votre cerveau, » {n}menace Pasqal en activant sa mécadendrite foreuse.{/n} « Que savez-vous d'Amarnat ? »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Habla o te arrebataré los recuerdos junto con el Ferrum Sanctum que tienes implantado en el cerebro». {n}Pasqal va pronunciado cada palabra a medida que activa su mecadendrita perforadora.{/n} «¿Qué sabes de Amarnat?».
languages.original_text: "Speak or I will rip your memories out along with the Ferrum Sanctum implanted in your brain." {n}Pasqal enunciates each word as he activates his drilling mechadendrite.{/n} "What do you know of Amarnat?"

traits.locale_text: «Habla o te arrebataré los recuerdos junto con el Ferrum Sanctum que tienes implantado en el cerebro». {n}Pasqal va pronunciado cada palabra a medida que activa su mecadendrita perforadora.{/n} «¿Qué sabes de Amarnat?».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Redet, sonst reiße ich Euch die Erinnerungen heraus, zusammen mit dem Ferrum Sanctum, das in Eurem Gehirn implantiert ist." {n}Pasqal spricht jedes Wort ganz deutlich aus, während er seinen Mechadendriten-Bohrer vorbereitet.{/n} "Was wisst Ihr über Amarnat?"
languages.original_text: "Speak or I will rip your memories out along with the Ferrum Sanctum implanted in your brain." {n}Pasqal enunciates each word as he activates his drilling mechadendrite.{/n} "What do you know of Amarnat?"

traits.locale_text: "Redet, sonst reiße ich Euch die Erinnerungen heraus, zusammen mit dem Ferrum Sanctum, das in Eurem Gehirn implantiert ist." {n}Pasqal spricht jedes Wort ganz deutlich aus, während er seinen Mechadendriten-Bohrer vorbereitet.{/n} "Was wisst Ihr über Amarnat?"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Konuşmazsan anılarını, beynine entegre edilmiş Demir Kutak'la beraber söküp alırım." {n}Pasqal, her bir sözcüğü vurguluyor ve delici mekadentritini çalıştırıyor.{/n} "Amarnat hakkında ne biliyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "Speak or I will rip your memories out along with the Ferrum Sanctum implanted in your brain." {n}Pasqal enunciates each word as he activates his drilling mechadendrite.{/n} "What do you know of Amarnat?"

traits.locale_text: "Konuş, yoksa anılarını, beynine entegre edilmiş Demir Kutak'la beraber söküp alırım." {n}Pasqal her bir sözcüğü vurguluyor ve delici mekadentritini çalıştırıyor.{/n} "Amarnat hakkında ne biliyorsun?"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
